languages.text: "Вцепились в меня, как Глейто в еретика". {n}Проктор забирает кубок и осушает его одним долгим могучим глотком.{/n} "Это точно амасек? Жидковат. Так и знал, что на планете с недостачей десятины и выпивку разбавляют".

"You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."
languages.original_text: "Вцепились в меня, как Глейто в еретика". {n}Проктор забирает кубок и осушает его одним долгим могучим глотком.{/n} "Это точно амасек? Жидковат. Так и знал, что на планете с недостачей десятины и выпивку разбавляют".

traits.locale_text: "You are like Glaito when he digs his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

"You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

"You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

"You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

"You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

languages.text: “你还真是锲而不舍，就像格雷托死死地咬住异端分子一样。”{n}索罗蒙举起酒杯，猛地喝了一大口。{/n}“你确定这是艾玛赛克酒吗？好像被掺了水。我相信，不肯老老实实缴纳什一税的地方，也同样会在酒里掺水。”
languages.original_text: "You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

traits.locale_text: “你还真是锲而不舍，就像格雷托死死地咬住异端分子一样。”{n}索罗蒙举起酒杯，猛地喝了一大口。{/n}“你确定这是艾玛赛克酒吗？好像被掺了水。我相信，不肯老老实实缴纳什一税的地方，也同样会在酒里掺水。”

languages.text: 「異端者に噛みついたときのグライトにそっくりですね」{n}代理人は杯を手に取り、力強く一気に飲み干した。{/n}「これは本当にアマセックでしょうか。いささか水っぽいですね。租税をごまかすような星だから、酒まで薄めて出してくるということでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者に噛みついたときのグライトにそっくりですね」{n}代理人は杯を手に取り、力強く一気に飲み干した。{/n}「これは本当にアマセックでしょうか。いささか水っぽいですね。租税をごまかすような星だから、酒まで薄めて出してくるということでしょうか」

languages.text: «Es usted igual que Glaito cuando le hinca el diente a un hereje». {n}El Procurador acepta la copa y la apura de golpe.{/n} «¿Seguro que esto es amasec? Lo encuentro un poco aguado. Cabía esperar que un planeta que escatima el diezmo diluya sus licores».
languages.original_text: "You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted igual que Glaito cuando le hinca el diente a un hereje». {n}El Procurador acepta la copa y la apura de golpe.{/n} «¿Seguro que esto es amasec? Lo encuentro un poco aguado. Cabía esperar que un planeta que escatima el diezmo diluya sus licores».

languages.text: "Kâfir görünce dişlerini geçiren Glaito gibisiniz." {n}Kadehi alan Üsteğmen, içindekileri tek bir dikişte içiyor.{/n} "Bunun amasek olduğundan emin misiniz? Fazla sulu. Aşarını eksik ödeyen bir gezegenin içkisini sulandırmasına şaşmamalı."
languages.original_text: "You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfir görünce dişlerini geçiren Glaito gibisiniz." {n}Kadehi alan Üsteğmen, içindekileri tek bir dikişte içiyor.{/n} "Bunun amasek olduğundan emin misiniz? Fazla sulu. Aşarını eksik ödeyen bir gezegenin içkisini sulandırmasına şaşmamalı."

languages.text: « Vous me faites penser à Glaito quand il plante ses crocs dans un hérétique. {n}Le proctor prend la coupe et vide son contenu en une longue et puissante gorgée.{/n} Vous êtes {mf|sur|sûre} que c'est de l'amasec ? On dirait qu'il est coupé avec de l'eau. Je ne serais pas surpris de constater qu'une planète qui fraude sur sa dîme n'hésite pas à diluer aussi son alcool. »
languages.original_text: "You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me faites penser à Glaito quand il plante ses crocs dans un hérétique. {n}Le proctor prend la coupe et vide son contenu en une longue et puissante gorgée.{/n} Vous êtes {mf|sur|sûre} que c'est de l'amasec ? On dirait qu'il est coupé avec de l'eau. Je ne serais pas surpris de constater qu'une planète qui fraude sur sa dîme n'hésite pas à diluer aussi son alcool. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid wie Glaito, wenn er seine Zähne in einen Ketzer schlägt." {n}Der Proktor nimmt den Becher und trinkt ihn in einem Zug aus.{/n} "Seid Ihr sicher, das ist Amasec? Ist ein bisschen wässrig. Tja, ein Planet, der seinen Zehnt nicht abführt, verdünnt vermutlich auch seinen Alkohol."
languages.original_text: "You are just like Glaito when he sinks his teeth into a heretic." {n}The Proctor takes the cup and downs it in one long, powerful gulp.{/n} "Are you sure this is amasec? It is a tad watery. Trust a planet that underpays its tithe to dilute its liquor as well."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid wie Glaito, wenn er seine Zähne in einen Ketzer schlägt." {n}Der Proktor nimmt den Becher und trinkt ihn in einem Zug aus.{/n} "Seid Ihr sicher, das ist Amasec? Ist ein bisschen wässrig. Tja, ein Planet, der seinen Zehnt nicht abführt, verdünnt vermutlich auch seinen Alkohol."
